description:
exp/ssa: introduce ChangeType instruction for value-preserving conversions.

This simplifies clients, e.g. ssa/interp, ssa/pointer (forthcoming).

Also:
- fix some fallout of the go/types accessors (CL 8770045):
   it's not always a compiler error to forget the parens in "x.f()"!
- rename Conv -> Convert.
- set position info on Conv, ChangeType, MakeInterface
  instructions arising from explicit type conversions.
- various doc comment fixes.

messages.text:

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=fbdabf9f38b9&repo=exp ***

exp/ssa: introduce ChangeType instruction for value-preserving conversions.

This simplifies clients, e.g. ssa/interp, ssa/pointer (forthcoming).

Also:
- fix some fallout of the go/types accessors (CL 8770045):
   it's not always a compiler error to forget the parens in "x.f()"!
- rename Conv -> Convert.
- set position info on Conv, ChangeType, MakeInterface
  instructions arising from explicit type conversions.
- various doc comment fixes.
